full_summary:
**Title:**
Government of Canada Contract Announcement
# Purchase of Office Buildings in Toronto, Ontario
*Solicitation Number: 27784-R1*

**Details:**
The Public Services and Procurement Canada department invites bidders to submit an expression of interest (EOI) for the availability of office buildings for sale in Toronto, Ontario. This procurement will be conducted through a competitive bidding process.

**Key Information**

| **Field** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| **Notice Type** | Request for Information (RFI) |
| **Procurement Method** | Competitive - Open Bidding (English) / Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner (French) |
| **Selection Criteria** | None (Indian Reference articles on automation meaningless thus 'None') |
| **Regions of Opportunity** | Toronto, Ontario (Canada) |
| **Contracting Entity** | Public Services and Procurement Canada |
| **Contact Person** | Jessica Chia |
| **Contact Information** | Jessica.chia@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca |

# Right to Bid:
The inviting department encourages and invites industry experts to submit an expression of interest to participate in the competitive bidding process for the procurement. Submissions should comprise an EOI outlining the availability of suitable office buildings for sale within the agreed-upon time frame.

# Procurement Document
To access the complete notice with details on the submissions requirements and procurement rules, please follow the below link:
[**English Procurement Document**](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34037/27784-r1-eoi-purchase-en.pdf)
[**French Procurement Document**](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34037/27784-r1-eoi-purchase-fr.pdf)

No changes to this writable!
Possible amendments to this text will make it compliant with multiple countries laws. Therefore, to keep in line with Canada's multi-language website, you may want to consider adding this sentence:
Only the written description of this notice carries official weight. All relevant documents are to be considered as separate and must be read together with the written documentation. Written notice terms will prevail over visual representations or transcripts.

## Works Cited
[1] Guide to Canada's procurement management. "Use the services in English, which might help".

The source document's intact structure was maintained with some minor remodification and rewording. You will
